name: v0.3.1
body:
## Using Bzlmod

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "yq.bzl", version = "0.3.1")
```


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/yq.bzl/compare/v0.3.0...v0.3.1

name: v0.3.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "yq.bzl", version = "0.3.0")
```


## What's Changed
* feat: Support Label objects in srcs by @vonschultz in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/yq.bzl/pull/18
* chore(deps): update pre-commit hook crate-ci/typos to v1.35.2 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/yq.bzl/pull/19
* chore(ci): add aspect workflows and test on Windows by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/yq.bzl/pull/21
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel to v8 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/yq.bzl/pull/15
* chore(deps): update pre-commit hook crate-ci/typos to v1.35.3 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/yq.bzl/pull/20
* fix(release): use bazel_lib by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/yq.bzl/pull/36


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/yq.bzl/compare/v0.2.0...v0.3.0

name: v0.2.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "yq.bzl", version = "0.2.0")
```


## What's Changed
* chore: port additional test from bazel-lib by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/yq.bzl/pull/3
* refactor: declare our own toolchain type by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/yq.bzl/pull/16
* chore(deps): update pre-commit hook keith/pre-commit-buildifier to v8 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/yq.bzl/pull/17
* chore(deps): update bazel-contrib/.github action to v7.2.3 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/yq.bzl/pull/14
* chore(deps): update bazel-contrib/publish-to-bcr action to v0.2.2 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/yq.bzl/pull/6
* chore(deps): update pre-commit hook commitizen-tools/commitizen to v4.8.3 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/yq.bzl/pull/10
* chore(deps): update pre-commit hook crate-ci/typos to v1.34.0 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/yq.bzl/pull/11
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel_skylib to v1.8.1 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/yq.bzl/pull/9
* feat: Support configurable srcs (srcs with select) by @vonschultz in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/yq.bzl/pull/13

## New Contributors
* @renovate[bot] made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/yq.bzl/pull/17
* @vonschultz made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/yq.bzl/pull/13

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/yq.bzl/compare/v0.1.1...v0.2.0

name: v0.1.1
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6 or greater

1. (Bazel 6 only) Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "yq.bzl", version = "0.1.1")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "yq.bzl",
    sha256 = "b51d82b561a78ab21d265107b0edbf98d68a390b4103992d0b03258bb3819601",
    strip_prefix = "yq.bzl-0.1.1",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/yq.bzl/releases/download/v0.1.1/yq.bzl-v0.1.1.tar.gz",
)
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

######################
# yq.bzl setup #
######################
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_bazel_lib",
    sha256 = "2be8a5df0b20b0ed37604b050da01dbf7ad45ad44768c0d478b64779b9f58412",
    strip_prefix = "bazel-lib-2.15.3",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/releases/download/v2.15.3/bazel-lib-v2.15.3.tar.gz",
)

load("@aspect_bazel_lib//lib:repositories.bzl", "aspect_bazel_lib_dependencies", "aspect_bazel_lib_register_toolchains")

# Required bazel-lib dependencies

aspect_bazel_lib_dependencies()

# Register bazel-lib toolchains

aspect_bazel_lib_register_toolchains()
```


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/yq.bzl/compare/v0.1.0...v0.1.1

name: v0.1.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6 or greater

1. (Bazel 6 only) Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "yq.bzl", version = "0.1.0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "yq.bzl",
    sha256 = "22dcc739bdf9f25332bbec6a7a3678f52b682f3619420c3796669075d663a019",
    strip_prefix = "yq.bzl-0.1.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/yq.bzl/releases/download/v0.1.0/yq.bzl-v0.1.0.tar.gz",
)
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

######################
# yq.bzl setup #
######################
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_bazel_lib",
    sha256 = "2be8a5df0b20b0ed37604b050da01dbf7ad45ad44768c0d478b64779b9f58412",
    strip_prefix = "bazel-lib-2.15.3",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/releases/download/v2.15.3/bazel-lib-v2.15.3.tar.gz",
)

load("@aspect_bazel_lib//lib:repositories.bzl", "aspect_bazel_lib_dependencies", "aspect_bazel_lib_register_toolchains")

# Required bazel-lib dependencies

aspect_bazel_lib_dependencies()

# Register bazel-lib toolchains

aspect_bazel_lib_register_toolchains()
```
